title: Artem Nazarchuk
subtitle: Frontend Developer
description: Frontend developer with nearly 3 years of practical experience in building fast, scalable, and accessible web applications using React.js, Next.js (App Router), TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Frontend developer with nearly 3 years of practical experience in building fast, scalable, and accessible web applications using React.js, Next.js (App Router), TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Specialized in internationalization (i18n), performance optimization (Core Web Vitals), and clean software architecture.
about.paragraph2: Experienced with agile workflows, CI/CD pipelines, and production-ready MVPs. Goal-oriented with a strong focus on quality and user experience. Currently working as a freelancer and indie developer, continuously learning and improving my skills.
